text: allahu satyavisvasikalil ninn avarkk ‎svargumuntennavyavasthayil avarute dehavum dhanavum vilaykku ‎vanniyirikkunnu. avar allahuvinre margayattil yud'dham ceyyunnu. ‎annane vadhikkukayum vadhikkappetukayum ceyyunnu. avarkk ‎svarga muntennat allahu tanre mel palikkal badhyatayayi ‎niscayicca satyanisthamaya vagdanaman. terattilum incili‎‎lum khur'asanilum atunt. allahuvekkal karar ‎palikkunnavanayi arunt? atinal ninnal natattiya kaccavata ‎itapatil santeasiccukealluka. atimahattaya vijayavum atutanne. ‎
